Burbank.KRLA: KRLA (870 AM) "AM 870 The Answer" is a radio station broadcasting a Talk format. Licensed to Glendale, California, United States, it serves Los Angeles and Southern California. The station is owned by Salem Communications, which also owns 99.5 KKLA-FM which features a Christian talk and instruction format, and 95.9 KFSH-FM with a Contemporary Christian music format.
